name: snip
description: macOS screenshot annotation tool with AI-powered organization
author: rixinw

scripts.build: node-gyp rebuild && electron-builder --mac && npm run sign:adhoc
scripts.sign:adhoc: [ -n "$CSC_LINK" ] || for app in dist/mac-*/Snip.app; do codesign --force --deep --sign - "$app" 2>/dev/null; done
